references.reason: This paper provides the foundation for the current work by establishing near-optimal regret bounds for differentially private reinforcement learning in the single-agent setting.

references.paper_title: Provable self-play algorithms for competitive reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper provides foundational results on multi-agent reinforcement learning without privacy constraints, which are extended in the current work to the differentially private setting.

references.paper_title: Local differential privacy for regret minimization in reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces local differential privacy to reinforcement learning, a key privacy concept used and extended in the current work.

references.paper_title: Private reinforcement learning with PAC and regret guarantees
references.reason: This paper provides important initial results on differentially private reinforcement learning, which are improved upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Differentially private regret minimization in episodic Markov decision processes
references.reason: This paper focuses on differentially private reinforcement learning in the simpler episodic MDP setting, which is generalized to the more complex Markov game setting in the current work.
